content.rendered:
The UAE has a two-tiered licensing system for businesses: professional licenses and general licenses. Professional licenses are issued to businesses that provide specialized services, such as accounting, law, and engineering. General licenses are issued to businesses that engage in a variety of activities, such as trading, manufacturing, and construction.

Benefits of Professional Licenses in the UAE

To start a business in Dubai, first, explore the benefits of a Professional license:

  • Credibility: A professional license shows that your business is legitimate and that you have the necessary skills and experience to provide your services.
  • Market Access: A professional license gives you the right to operate in the UAE and to market your services to local and international customers.
  • Government Support: The UAE government provides several support programs for businesses with professional licenses, such as training, financing, and marketing assistance.
  • Tax Benefits: Businesses with professional licenses may be eligible for certain tax breaks and exemptions.

Benefits of Instant Licenses in the UAE

To open a business in Dubai in activities such as trading, manufacturing, and construction, you require an instant license. Here’s what you get out of it:

  • Quick and easy to obtain: Instant licenses can be obtained in as little as 5 minutes. This makes it a great option for businesses that need to start up quickly or that are only operating in the UAE temporarily.
  • Lower costs: The cost of an instant license is typically lower than the cost of a general license. This can save businesses money, especially if they are just starting out.
  • Less paperwork: The application process for an instant license is simpler than the application process for a general license. This can save businesses time and hassle.

Requirements for Obtaining Professional Licenses in the UAE

The requirements for obtaining a professional license in the UAE vary depending on the type of business you are operating. Some of the common requirements include:
  • Minimum share capital: The minimum share capital required for a professional license varies depending on the type of business.
  • Local presence: You must have a physical presence in the UAE, such as an office or a representative.
  • UAE-based bank account: You must have a bank account in the UAE that is in your name or the name of your business.
  • Professional qualifications: You must have the necessary professional qualifications to provide the services that you are offering.
  • Experience: You must have a certain amount of experience in the field that you are operating in.

How to Apply for a Professional License or Instant License in the UAE?

To apply for a professional license or instant license in the UAE, you can visit the website of the Department of Economic Development (DED). The DED has a comprehensive online application system that makes it easy to apply for a license.
Once you have submitted your application, the DED will review it and approve or deny it within a few weeks. If your application is approved, you will be issued a license.

Get a Professional/Instant License for your Company Setup in Dubai

A company setup consultants in Dubai, such as A&A Associate, can help you through the entire process, from choosing the right type of license to filing the necessary paperwork. We can also help you with marketing and branding, so you can hit the ground running once your business is up and running.

Professional license - AED 12,500

A Professional Service License is granted to professionals who offer professional services in the United Arab Emirates, such as an architect offering architecture services, a product design expert or an interior designer offering his/her services, a web designer or UI/UX designer offering his/her professional services, and so on. Sometimes, it may be possible that a group of professionals want to offer their services jointly, such as two attorneys wanting to open a law firm together. In such a case, the company would be known as a civil corporation.
License Issued from DSO - IFZA
Free Ski Dubai Passes
Inclusions
  • Trade License.
  • Local Agent Agreement.
  • MOA
Deliverables
  • Trade name.
  • Initial approval.
  • Payment voucher covered up to AED 4000.
  • Local Service agent.
  • PRO charges.
What can you do?

Generally speaking, a professional is someone who is trained to offer a service. In other words, he/she is a specialist offering specialized services.
Some of the common business activities / professions which require a Professional Service License are as follows

  • Accountants, Auditors and Financial Advisors
  • Accounting and Auditing Companies
  • Advertising professionals and Entertainment Artists
  • Architectural Consultants
  • Beauty Salons
  • Business Consultants
  • Carpentry and Artisan Activities
  • Computer Graphic Design
  • Consultancy Services
  • Document Clearing
  • Health and Medical Services
  • Information Technology Services
  • Internet and Web Design Services
  • Lawyers and Legal Advisors
  • Management Consultancy
  • Medical Representatives
  • Printing and Publishing
  • Teachers and Educational Professors
  • Technical Services
  • Security Services
Notes

License renewal – AED 12,500
This package does not include any residence visa.
However, you can get up to 6 visas by paying additional fees for each quota approved.

*Conditions Apply
